column5: In the human-computer interaction master's degree, you'll study how people interact with websites, computer systems, and software, enabling you to create intuitive interfaces that improve how we interact with and use emerging technologies.Online Option AvailableCo-op/Internship EncouragedSTEM-OPT Visa Eligible100% Outcome Rate of RIT Graduates from
